channel.title: Hiroshima on David Calhoun - Photography Blog

item.title: Video: Travel photography in Japan (part one)
item.description: A few weeks back I took another trip to Japan, a few days of which were dedicated to taking photos. In this first video you can really tell that I got around - I definitely got some good use of the JR Pass, which gives you unlimited access to the bullet trains. Atomic Bomb Dome from Aioi Bridge (Hiroshima, Japan) Floating torii: Itsukushima Shrine (Miyajima Shrine) near Hiroshima, Japan Togetsukyo Bridge in Arashiyama (Kyoto, Japan) Filming locations in this video:
